name: Shiny (itch) (rileyob2k, GamaRayz)
description:
Fly around as a witch's familiar, a crow named Nox, to help befriend the residents of her new town in this 3D casual adventure game.  

After playing the game, make sure to help us improve by giving us feedback here. 

Follow our flight on Twitter for more updates!

Dev Log

Beta is Live! The newest file for PC to download is available at the link below.  We are still working on mobile integration.
